Bot.Ping, Uptime: See the response time and uptime of the bot.

Voice.Join: Make me join your VC, Usage: `&pref;join @USER` or `&pref;join`
Voice.Leave: Make me leave the current VC I'm in.
Voice.Say:
Make the bot say something. Usage: `&pref;say (Your message)`
Please note that messages **CAN'T** contain `<:` and a custom emoji in the same sentence, on their own their fine to use
